source:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_00Regitt has a twinkle in his eye and a request on his lips.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラスでのみ進行します。

ワッツハンマー・ガレージのレギットは、戦車の特別な車体部品を集めているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_02<tab>Shigitt has tasked you with crafting four core components, then delivering the completed items to Regitt.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SEQ_02シギットと話した
レギットに依頼された品を納品

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_001<tab>Our Rolling Tankards will be the culmination of much careful planning and applied theory, which is why I want to entrust the most vital elements to a master artisan of proven quality. ...Aye, that would be you!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_001ドワーフ戦車は、ワシらの技術と知恵の結晶ラリ～！
だからこそ、重要な部材は完成度が高い逸品を作れる、
)) (( )) 02 /var>に、お任せしたいラリよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_003<tab>There's much to be done, but Shigitt can give you the details─and the resources─you need to proceed. We're counting on you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_003製作してほしい「」の説明は、
「シギット」から聞いてほしいラリ～！
必要な素材も用意してあるから、頼むラリよ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_010<tab>Ready to make some core components for the Tankard, then? Glad to have you aboard.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_010フッ……「」の件だな。
協力に感謝しよう。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_012<tab>Right, so what I need from you is four tempered nozzles, highly resistant to heat─they'll be used in the fuel injection device for emergency escapes, so we'll want to be sure they work. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_012さっそく、高熱に耐えられるノズルを4個、作ってもらえるか？
緊急脱出用の噴射装置に使用したいのでな。
素材はこれを……不足したら僕に声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_013<tab>Right, so what I need from you is four padded cushions for the tank's interior─we need to make sure the automaton inside is properly protected from impacts. Start with these materials, and let me know if you need more.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_013さっそく、操縦シートのクッション材を4個、作ってもらえるか？
車内の操縦オートマトンを衝撃から守りたいのでな。
素材はこれを……不足したら僕に声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_014<tab>Right, so what I need from you is four durable tracks of rubber for the wheels─when the going gets rough, we'll want the tank to keep rolling. Start with these ingredients, and let me know if you need more.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_014さっそく、タイヤ用の特殊ゴムを4つ分、作ってもらえるか？
どんな地形にも対応できる走破性が要求されるのでな。
素材はこれを……不足したら僕に声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_016<tab>Once you're satisfied, take what you've made straight to Regitt, and he'll pass it on to the tank engineers. They're eager to put everything together!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_016それから完成した品は「レギット」に納品してもらいたい。
すぐにでも組み立て工程に、回してやりたいからな。
よろしく頼む！

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_017<tab>You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_017お、追加の素材か？
……今は、大丈夫そうだな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_018<tab>You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_018お、追加の素材か？
……今は、大丈夫そうだな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_019<tab>You've got everything you need, so all that remains is the application of some elbow grease!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_019お、追加の素材か？
……今は、大丈夫そうだな。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_020<tab>Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_020素材が足りなくなったのか？
仕方ないなぁ……ほら、使うといいぞ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_021<tab>Out of materials already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_021素材が足りなくなったのか？
仕方ないなぁ……ほら、使うといいぞ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_022<tab>Out of ingredients already? ...Fine. I suppose I can spare some from the stores.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_SHIGITT_000_022素材が足りなくなったのか？
仕方ないなぁ……ほら、使うといいぞ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What have you brought me!?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_030重要部材は完成したラリか？
持ってきてくれたなら、受け取らせてもらうラリ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_031<tab>Now this is some fine work...very fine indeed! With parts of this quality, our tanks will perform even better than Watts could've imagined! Lali-ho-ho-ho, I am moved to tears! Flabbergasted! Duly impressed!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_031ほっほ～！　さ～すがピカイチの品質ラリ～！
これを活かせば、ワッツの構想以上の性能になるはずラリ！
感謝カンゲキ、雨ラリホーのラリホッホ、ラリよ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_032<tab>...Uh, not that I'm trying to flatter you so you'll accept an even more difficult task next time or anything like that! I just...know how to appreciate true artisanship! Yes!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA103_03904_REGITT_000_032…………別におだてて、さらに面倒な仕事を、
押し付けようだなんて少しも思ってないラリよ？
本当ラリ……でも、またよろしくラリね～！
